DAN MORRILL wrote:
> I am getting a Java IO error when trying to get a DNS name on kicking off
> the search request. 

This is for any seed?  You're using default configuration?  Is it 
windows (If so, perhaps http://crawler.archive.org/faq.html#windowsstart 
helps?).  Any other clues in ${HERITRIX_HOME}/heritrix_out.log as to why 
its failing?  Latest Heritrix or something older?

St.Ack



I see no network actiity, and there is nothing else
> running on the box. If I do an NSLookup I get a resolved address, 
> entered it
> into the hosts file, and still get the same error.
> 
> Suggestions or idea's welcome
> r/Dan
